meanings.definition: Happening or appearing suddenly or unexpectedly
meanings.sent1: An overnight success in the music industry is rare.
meanings.sent2: The overnight change in weather caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent3: His overnight decision to quit his job shocked his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The overnight fame brought both joy and challenges.
